subject: My Warmest Greetings
body:
My Warmest Greetings
I am Mrs. Christina Cook from South Africa. A cancer patient, married to the late Dr McCauley Cook who was a very successful Gold businessman. I am donating the sum of $10.5 million United State Dollars to you for charity works in Your Country.I want you to use it and help the underprivileged and widows since i cannot do it myself due to my cancer problem, my doctors have revealed that i will not last long. I hope you accept my kind gesture. Kindly get back to me for more details at this Email : 
recruitinvestglobal@gmail.com
 (hidden link going to 
mrlouisramgoolam@gmail.com
)
I await your reply for details.
 Mrs. Christina Cook

subject: Re: My Warmest Greetings
body:
Hello Mrs. Christina Cook,

I'm deeply touched by your story and your generous intention to help the less fortunate. It's truly inspiring to see such kindness in the world, especially in times of personal hardship.

I would be honored to learn more about this noble cause and how I can contribute. Could you please provide me with more details? For instance, what kind of charity works are you particularly interested in? And how do you envision these funds being used to make a difference?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Marissa

subject: My Warmest Greetings
body:
Dearest one Marissa

My Name is Mrs. Chrissy Cook. I am 70 years old based in South Africa and I
was married to Late McCauley Cook  who was a contractor with the Government
of South Africa before he died in a plane crash in 2000 in Kenya airways. I
am a new Christian convert, suffering from long term breast cancer.

All indications from my doctor are that my condition is really
deteriorating and it is quite obvious that I wouldn't live more than three
months, according to my doctors and in all indications with regards to
medical analysis. This is because the cancer disease has gotten to a very
bad stage that no hope for me to be a living person again.40 years period
of marriage life, still we could not produce any child, my late husband was
very wealthy and after his death, I inherited some part of his business and
money in the bank.

The the most important thing for me here is for you to assure me that the
funds will be distributed as I mentioned which is my last wish and this is
legit, I have never been involved in anything illegal and I will not start
it now so if you are interested and ready to carry out my wish as
instructed then be advised to provide me a copy of your ID and direct
contact details which will enable me introduce you to my banker as my next
of kin, this is very urgent, I will be looking forward hearing from you.
Regards
Mrs. Cook
